00040         CServiceRegistration* CServiceRegistry::RegisterService(SF_RIID riid, IUnknown *service, CBundle* bundle)
00041         {
00042                 THREAD_ANY();
00043 
00044                 CServiceRegistration* pReg;
00045                 create_instance_impl(&pReg);
00046 
00047                 pReg->FinalConstruct(riid, service, bundle);
00048 
00049                 {
00050                         write_lock l(m_lock);
00051                         m_servicesByID.insert(std::make_pair(riid, pReg));
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 return pReg;
00055         }
00056 
00058 
00059         void CServiceRegistry::UnregisterService(Framework::CServiceRegistration *service)
00060         {
00062                 THREAD_ANY();
00063                 write_lock l(m_lock);
00064 
00065                 std::pair<TServiceByID::iterator, TServiceByID::iterator> range = m_servicesByID.equal_range(service->getID());
00066                 while(range.first != range.second)
00067                 {
00068                         if(range.first->second == service)
00069                         {
00070                                 m_servicesByID.erase(range.first);
00071                                 service->Release();
00072                                 break;
00073                         }
00074                         ++range.first;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00079 
00080         com_ptr<IServiceReference> CServiceRegistry::getServiceReference(SF_RIID riid)
00081         {
00082                 THREAD_ANY();
00083                 read_lock l(m_lock);
00084 
00085                 std::pair<TServiceByID::iterator, TServiceByID::iterator> range = m_servicesByID.equal_range(riid);
00087                 if(range.first != range.second)
00088                         return range.first->second->getReference();
00089 
00090                 return com_ptr<IServiceReference>();
00091         }
